name: Tone Sphere
description:
Ride and explore the spherical world of Tone Sphere using your rythmic sense.

It's the most cosmic rhythm action game in the world, you know.

More than 65 songs, 250+ levels and the adventure in Sphere Map are waiting for you!
-----------------
Tone Sphere is a 360' rhythm game in a bizarre three-dimensional space - from easy and fun to challenging.

Official site:http://tonesphere.com/
-----------------
148Apps 4.5/5
iReviewT A-
Snackbar Games 4/5
TheAppShack 5/5
-----------------

Developed as a personal project of Sta Kousin.
